official_title: To provide for the conveyance of certain National Forest System lands to the towns of Laona and Wabeno, Wisconsin.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest System lands to the towns of Laona and Wabeno, Wisconsin.
